name: roll20-rogue-trader-api
description: Collection of Roll20 API Scripts for a FFG Rogue Trader Campaign.

scripts.compile: echo "require('mock20');" > INQTotal.js && find ./Scripts -type f -exec cat {} + >> INQTotal.js && echo "MOCK20endOfLastScript();" >> INQTotal.js
